abstract: Thousands of Thai soldiers and volunteers work to strengthen Bangkok's flood defenses as water surges to city's edges two days after officials proclaimed that worst was over.
snippet: Thousands of volunteers and soldiers battled to strengthen Bangkok’s flood defenses as water surged to the edges of the city two days after officials proclaimed that the worst was over.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of volunteers and soldiers battled to strengthen Bangkok’s flood defenses as water surged to the edges of the city two days after officials proclaimed that the worst was over.

headline.main: Fears Revived in Bangkok as Flood Waters Surge
headline.print_headline: Bangkok Fortifies Flood Defenses as Water Rises to Its Edges
headline.seo: Thailand Fortifies Flood Defenses Around Bangkok
